casebody.data:
McLAUGHLIN, et al.
v.
BAILEY, et al. No. 163A15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Sept. 3, 2015. Harvey L. Kennedy, Winston-Salem, for McLaughlin, Ivan, et al. Harold L. Kennedy, III, Winston-Salem, for McLaughlin, Ivan, et al. Sean F. Perrin, Charlotte, for Bailey, Daniel, et al.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 2nd of September 2015 by Plaintiffs:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 3rd of September 2015."
ERVIN, J., recused.
